title: Collier's

contents.note: FictionMags (partial: fiction contents of selected issues)

renewed-contributions.title: Sweet William
renewed-contributions.note: Issue designation as per FictionMags. CCE puts this story in the next issue. I have not checked the issues in question myself.

renewed-contributions.title: Sweet William
renewed-contributions.note: Issue designation as per CCE. FictionMags puts this story in the previous issue. I have not checked the issues in question myself.

renewed-contributions.title: In a Fair Way to Murder
Has the Church Done More Harm Than Good?
Is There Anything a Man Can Believe?
The Fleet was in the River
The Zone Map
renewed-contributions.title-note: Title as given in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'The Emperor of America' and notes 'The Zone Map' as an alternate title.

renewed-contributions.title: The Barking Dago
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE. FictionMags gives title as 'The Barking Dogs'. I have not checked the issue myself.

renewed-contributions.title: The White Room in Washington
renewed-contributions.note: We are not sure if this is the same contribution as the one above, but there is a separate renewal record for this title.  The renewal was filed in 1955; the renewal above was filed in 1956. FictionMags mentions 'The White Room', but not 'The White Room in Washington', in the table of contents for this issue.

renewed-contributions.title: The Sooper Speaker
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'The Sooper Speaking'. We have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: The Robin, and the Rare, Rare Lily
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE. FictionMags gives title simply as 'The Rare, Rare Lily'. I have not checked the issue myself.

renewed-contributions.title: The Fly Catcher
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'The Flycatcher'. We have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: The Seven Policemen
renewed-contributions.note: A CCE renewal record lists this title as appearing in the August 25, 1928 issue of Liberty, but FictionMags instead places that story in an issue of Collier's with the same date.  I have not examined the issues in question.

renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'With Rope and Gum'. We have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: The Deathless Miracle
renewed-contributions.note: Title and issue per FictionMags.  CCE does not record a renewal with this story or issue title, but does record a renewal for 'Angel Unawares (Deathless Miracle)' in the March 28 issue. We have not examined the issues in quesstion.

renewed-contributions.title: Angel Unawares (Deathless Miracle)
renewed-contributions.note: Title and issue per CCE renewal record.  FictionMags does not record a story with this title or author in this issue, but does mention a story 'Deathless Miracle' by Farnol in the March 21 issue. We have not examined the issues in quesstion.

renewed-contributions.title: Spring in the Heart
renewed-contributions.note: Issue date as given on cover.  CCE renewal record gives issue date as April 14; that appears to be an error.

comment: Pick up with 1959 Jan-Jun contribution renewals.
additional-note: Active contribution renewals are recorded beginning in the 1954 January-June CCE volume, but the earliest renewed contribution is noted in the 1954 July-December volume.
